adHeader: Safe, Reliable Help by College Students: Event Setup, Bartending, etc
adDetails: We are College Labor (collegelabor.org), an online community that connects households and business with eager, pre-screened, friendly college students for affordable Moving, Hauling and Errand services in the San Francisco Bay Area! We offer a safer more reliable alternative to most c-list providers at a price well below professional rates. We specialize in: Holiday Help, Event Setup, Party Bar-tending, Catering Help, Serving, Party Clean Up, Serving, Odd Jobs - just inquire. As well as... - Odd Jobs and Errands: Cleaning, Delivery/Pick Up Services, Furniture Assembly, Painting, Gardening Help, etc. - Moving: Cross Town Moving, Packing, Moving Truck Loading, Heavy Lifting, In Home/Apt. Building Moving, Truck Rental, etc. - Hauling: Garbage Disposal, Yard Waste Removal, Junk Removal, Organizing Help, Construction Assistance, etc. Get Started by filling out a short application describing your job on our website - https://collegelabor.org (sorry, Craigslist no longer allows links - please copy and paste link into browser) Support your local College Community! Please email us through this ad if you have any questions about how College Labor works, thank you. College Labor Team Follow or Like us on: - Twitter - Facebook - Linkedin - Pinterest
